moTa: The Kia Cadenza is available as a sedan. The 2018 Cadenza starts at $32,290 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $900. It gets EPA-estimated 23 MPG combined. The Kia Cadenza competes against models like the Ford Fusion Hybrid, Volvo S60, and Acura TLX. The Cadenza is a good fit for small families Small Family vehicles include mid-size and larger sedans, hatchbacks, wagons, SUVs and minivans with four doors and five seats. .

The Kia Forte is available as a coming soon, hatchback and sedan. The Kia Forte competes against models like the Ford Fiesta, Ford Focus, and Ford Fusion. The Forte is a good fit for commuters Commuter vehicles have a minimum EPA-estimated mileage of 30 mpg combined. May require specific trim level and/or optional features. .

The Kia Forte Koup is available as a coupe. Inventory prices for the 2016 Forte Koup range from $10,593 to $19,069. It gets EPA-estimated 25-28 MPG combined. The Kia Forte Koup competes against models like the Honda Civic, Honda Accord, and smart ForTwo Electric Drive.

The Kia K900 is available as a coming soon and sedan. The Kia K900 competes against models like the Ford Taurus, Mazda Mazda3, and Chevrolet Sonic. The K900 is a good fit for small families Small Family vehicles include mid-size and larger sedans, hatchbacks, wagons, SUVs and minivans with four doors and five seats. .

On sale since 2001, the five-seat Kia Optima competes in the crowded mid-size sedan class. It offers several premium features, as well as two available turbocharged engines, one of which pairs with a seven-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission. In addition to gas-only versions, hybrid and plug-in hybrid variants are available. Value-oriented pricing and an impressive new-car warranty have helped broaden the Kia Optima's appeal. The Optima is a good fit for commuters Commuter vehicles have a minimum EPA-estimated mileage of 30 mpg combined. May require specific trim level and/or optional features. and small families Small Family vehicles include mid-size and larger sedans, hatchbacks, wagons, SUVs and minivans with four doors and five seats. .

The Kia Optima Hybrid competes against models like the Kia Cadenza, Kia Stinger, and Ford Fusion Hybrid.
